22  void Descriptor::operator=(const Descriptor &descriptor){
23 
24  // invariant components
25  this->invariant.shape = descriptor.invariant.shape ;
26  this->invariant.area = descriptor.invariant.area ;
27  for (int i=0;i<7;i++)
28  this->invariant.hu[i] = descriptor.invariant.hu[i] ;
29 
30  // Dynamic components
31  this->dynamic.uc = descriptor.dynamic.uc;
32  this->dynamic.vc = descriptor.dynamic.vc;
33  this->dynamic.theta = descriptor.dynamic.theta;
34  this->dynamic.area = descriptor.dynamic.area;
35  this->dynamic.radius = descriptor.dynamic.radius;
36 
37  // Normalize angle
38  if (this->dynamic.theta > M_PI){
39  this->dynamic.theta -= 2*M_PI;
40  } else if (this->dynamic.theta > M_PI) {
41  this->dynamic.theta += 2*M_PI;
42  }
43  return;
44  }

51  Descriptor Descriptor::operator+(const Descriptor &descriptor){

53 
54  // invariant components

56  result.invariant.area = this->invariant.area + descriptor.invariant.area;
57  for (int i=0;i<7;i++)
58  result.invariant.hu[i] = this->invariant.hu[i] + descriptor.invariant.hu[i] ;
59 
60  // Dynamic components
61  result.dynamic.uc = this->dynamic.uc + descriptor.dynamic.uc;
62  result.dynamic.vc = this->dynamic.vc + descriptor.dynamic.vc;
63  result.dynamic.theta = this->dynamic.theta + descriptor.dynamic.theta;

65  result.dynamic.radius = this->dynamic.radius + descriptor.dynamic.radius;
66

70  } else if (result.dynamic.theta > M_PI) {

72  }

110  Descriptor Descriptor::operator*(const double scalar){
111  Descriptor result;
112 
113  // invariant components
114  result.invariant.shape = scalar * this->invariant.shape;
115  result.invariant.area = scalar * this->invariant.area ;
116  for (int i=0;i<7;i++)
117  result.invariant.hu[i] = scalar * this->invariant.hu[i] ;
118 
119  // Dynamic components
120  result.dynamic.uc = scalar * this->dynamic.uc ;
121  result.dynamic.vc = scalar * this->dynamic.vc ;
122  result.dynamic.theta = scalar * this->dynamic.theta ;
123  result.dynamic.area = scalar * this->dynamic.area ;
124  result.dynamic.radius = scalar * this->dynamic.radius ;
125 
126  // Normalize angle
127  if (result.dynamic.theta > M_PI){
128  result.dynamic.theta -= 2*M_PI;
129  } else if (result.dynamic.theta > M_PI) {
130  result.dynamic.theta += 2*M_PI;
131  }
132  return result;
133  }

176  void Descriptor::assemble(std::vector<cv::Point> &contours, int option = (INVARIANT | DYNAMIC) ){
177  double hu[7];
178 
179  // Compute regular, centra, normalized moments, centroid and invariante moments (Hu).
180  cv::Moments moment = cv::moments( contours, true );
181  cv::Point2f centroid = cv::Point2f( moment.m10/moment.m00 , moment.m01/moment.m00 );
182  HuMoments(moment, hu);
183 
184  // Compute image inertia moment matrix, its eigenvalues and eigenvectors.
185  // ps: eigenvector stores in descending order in a column vector. Eigenvector are stored in rows, same order as their respective eigenvalues.
186  cv::Mat eigenvalues, eigenvectors, J;
187  J = (cv::Mat_<double>(2,2)<<moment.mu20, moment.mu11, moment.mu11, moment.mu02 );
188  cv::eigen(J,eigenvalues, eigenvectors);
189 
190  // Descriptor invariant components
191  if (option & INVARIANT){
192  this->invariant.shape = eigenvalues.at<double>(0,1)/eigenvalues.at<double>(0,0);
193  this->invariant.area = 4*M_PI*std::sqrt(moment.nu02*moment.nu20 - moment.nu11*moment.nu11);
194  for (int i=0;i<7;++i)
195  this->invariant.hu[i] = hu[i];
196  }
197 
198  // Descriptor dynamic components
199  if (option & DYNAMIC){
200  cv::Point2f circleCenter;
201  float radius;
202 
203  cv::minEnclosingCircle( contours, circleCenter, radius );
204 
205  this->dynamic.uc = circleCenter.x; //ellipse.center.x ;//circleCenter.x;
206  this->dynamic.vc = circleCenter.y; //ellipse.center.y ;//circleCenter.y;
207  this->dynamic.area = moment.m00;
208  this->dynamic.theta = std::atan2( eigenvectors.at<double>(0,1) , eigenvectors.at<double>(0,0) ) ;
209 
210  // Find furthest point from the circle center that belongs to the contour.
211  double max_dist = 0;
212  for (int i=0; i<contours.size();++i){
213  double dist = pow(contours[i].x - circleCenter.x,2) + pow(contours[i].y - circleCenter.y,2);
214  if (dist > max_dist) {
215  max_dist = dist;
216  }
217  }
218  this->dynamic.radius = std::sqrt(max_dist);
219 
220  // The following code lines are for fixing the angle. It is based in the relative position between the confined circle center and the landmark mass centroid. It only makes sensse if both are not in the same place.
221  if ( std::abs(centroid.y - circleCenter.y) > std::abs(centroid.x - circleCenter.x) ){ // Accuracy along the v-axis is higher
222  if ( (centroid.y - circleCenter.y) > 0){ // expects positive angle
223  if (this->dynamic.theta < 0)
224  this->dynamic.theta += M_PI;
225  } else { // expects negative angle
226  if (this->dynamic.theta > 0)
227  this->dynamic.theta -= M_PI;
228  }
229 
230  } else{ // Accuracy along the u-axis is higher
231  if ( (centroid.x - circleCenter.x) > 0){ // expects angle < 90o.
232  if (std::abs(this->dynamic.theta) > M_PI/2)
233  this->dynamic.theta -= sign(this->dynamic.theta)*M_PI;
234  } else { // expects angle > 90o.
235  if (std::abs(this->dynamic.theta) < M_PI/2)
236  this->dynamic.theta -= sign(this->dynamic.theta)*M_PI;
237  }
238  }
239 
240  }
241  }
242 
243 
252  void Descriptor::similarity(Descriptor &base, Descriptor &distLimits, int &invariant_score, double &dynamic_score ){
253  invariant_score = 0;
254  dynamic_score = 0;
255 
256  // Compute distance between current descriptor and base descriptor
257  Descriptor distance = (*this) - base;
258 
259  // Compare and score according to threshold defined in limits
260  // Shape
261  if ( checkDistance(distance.invariant.shape, distLimits.invariant.shape) )
262  invariant_score++;
263 
264  // Area
265  if ( checkDistance(distance.invariant.area, distLimits.invariant.area) ){
266  invariant_score++;
267  }
268 
269  // Hu moments
270  for (int i=0;i<7;i++) {
271  if ( checkDistance(distance.invariant.hu[i], distLimits.invariant.hu[i]) ){
272  invariant_score++;
273  }
274  }
275 
276  // Dynamic score (More weight is given to position in respect to the last (uc,vc) observed)
277  dynamic_score = 1.0/( 0.5*(std::sqrt(pow(distance.dynamic.uc ,2) + pow(distance.dynamic.vc ,2))) + 0.01) +
278  1.0/(0.1*std::abs(distance.dynamic.area) + 0.01 ) +
279  1.0/(0.1*std::abs(distance.dynamic.radius) + 0.01 );
280 
281 
282 
283  }

288  void Descriptor::printFormatted(void){
289  // invariant
290  std::cout << "invariant characteristics: " << std::endl;
291  std::cout << "shape: " << this->invariant.shape << std::endl;
292  std::cout << "area: " << this->invariant.area << std::endl;
293  std::cout << "hu moments: [" ;
294  for (int i=0;i<7;++i){
295  std::cout << this->invariant.hu[i] << " " ;
296  }
297  std::cout << "]" << std::endl;
298 
299  // Dynamic
300  std::cout << "Dynamic characterists: " << std::endl;
301  std::cout << "(uc,vc): (" << this->dynamic.uc << " , " << this->dynamic.vc << ")" << std::endl;
302  std::cout << "theta (deg): " << this->dynamic.theta*180/M_PI << std::endl;
303  std::cout << "area (pixels): " << this->dynamic.area << std::endl;
304  std::cout << "radius: " << this->dynamic.radius << std::endl;
305  }

325  }

331  int sign(double n){
332  if (n<0){
333  return -1;
334  }else

343  bool checkDistance(double &n, double &thresh){
344  if ( (n < thresh) && (n > -thresh) )
345  return true;
346  else
347  return false;
348  }
